Package com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer.heuristic

Class Summary
GraphStatisticsHeuristic This heuristic is a wrapper around the Jena graph statistics handler which returns exact selectivities for SPO.
Heuristic This is the top abstract class for heuristic implementations
HeuristicBasicPattern The abstract class defines the methods required for implementations of cost estimators for BasicPatterns.
HeuristicsBroker The heuristic broker implements a decision making program for the selection of heuristic techniques required for optimizer implementations.
HeuristicsRegistry The class is a registry for heuristics
OptimalNoStats This is the default heuristic used in ARQ which does not require any pre-computed statistics
ProbabilisticFramework The heuristics is a wrapper to the probabilistic framework.
ProbabilisticFrameworkJoin The heuristics is a wrapper to the probabilistic framework.
VariableCounting This heuristic implements a simple variable counting technique to estimate the execution cost of edges and nodes of graphs (i.e.
VariableCountingUnbound This heuristic is very similar to the variable counting heuristic, though it gives weight 1.0 to bound predicate joins.
